name: Escape from Driftwood Island v7.0
description:
This is a survival RPG game with a dynamic Day/ Night time system. You must eat or starve. You must rest or be slowed when exhausted.

Craft tools, weapons, food and other items. Make new crafting areas to make life even better with higher tier tools!

Monsters roam the Island in dark places and at night! There must be some kind of curse at work here...

Search the Island and reveal the mystery! Help your wounded Capt. overcome his injuries! Build a raft and escape. Fishing, setting snares and fighting undead all in a nice little paradise setting!

Can you "Escape from driftwood Island"?
